description: Location! Location! Location! Welcome to Keystone in sought-after Willoughby! 1,789 SQ FT home- This 4 bed, 4 bath unit features a spacious family room, soaring 2-storey entry, side-by-side double garage, epoxy garage floor coating, high-efficiency A/C, on-demand tankless hot water, large kitchen island, soft-close cabinets. Prime location- Easy access to Hwy #1, walk to Carvolth Exchange - park & ride (bus to SkyTrain), and close to shops, restaurants, parks and more. A fantastic opportunity in a family-friendly community!
